name: Mrs. Weathers
location: Cottonwood Cove, in the slave pen
descriptions: Mrs. Weathers is a capture of Caesar's Legion being held in Cottonwood Cove in 2281.

Mrs. Weathers and her two children, Kenny Weathers and Sammy Weathers, were captured by the Legion while relocating in the Mojave. Her abusive husband, Frank Weathers, abandoned them to the Legion after fleeing the attack.

topics.response_text: Please, ma'am - take pity on us. Free us, I'm begging you!

topics.topic_text: Frank sent me to free you.
topics.response_text: {Afraid}That man knows where we are? Just when I didn't think this could get any worse!
Ever since he lost his job a few years back he hasn't been the same. He took a switch to us for the tiniest things.
Anything you can do to help, just please get us out of here.

topics.topic_text: Trust me, your troubles are over. <Set off the explosive in her collar>
I've paid for the three of you. You are free to go.
topics.response_text: {shocked disbelief}Th-thank you! I don't know that we'll ever be able to repay you, but we'll do our best one day once I've found a place to settle.

topics.topic: VFreeformCottonwoodCoveNVCCMrsWeathersTopic008<SPEECH - Player tells her to make a run for it>
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{wanting to believe}You think we can make it? You really do?

topics.topic_text: <Give Mrs. Weathers the key from Canyon Runner>
topics.response_text: {shocked disbelief}Th-thank you! I don't know that we'll ever be able to repay you, but we'll do our best one day once I've found a place to settle.

topics.topic_text: I'll see what I can do.

topics.response_text: No way. If the guard catches you, we'll be beaten.

topics.topic_text: Hold still. <Deactivate the charge and remove her collar>
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] My goodness! I swear my heart skipped a beat!

topics.topic_text: Looks tougher than I thought. We'll have to find another solution.
topics.response_text: {pleading}Anything that gets us out of here, please.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> I paid for your release. You're free to go.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Finally! Let's get out of here!
One of these days we'll be free.
My family was ambushed by a pack of Legion raiders near Searchlight and Frank ran off, the gutless coward!

conversation.response_text: {Pleading}Anything that gets us out of here, please.
